name: show_id
description: Unique ID for every Movie / Tv Show

name: cast
description: Actors involved in the movie / show

name: country
description: Country where the movie / show was produced

name: date_added
description: Date it was added on Netflix (format: 'Month day, Year')

name: release_year
description: Actual Release year of the move / show

name: rating
description: TV Rating of the movie / show

name: duration
description: Total Duration - in minutes or number of seasons

name: listed_in
description: Genre of movie or tv show
